messages.message:
Question re UAT testing. Do we have any document which explains what we expect to see on these use cases? E.g.
https://instabase.testmo.net/runs/view/78?group_id=389&test_id=51881&filter=eyJtb2RlIjo[…]p7InJ1bl90ZXN0czphc3NpZ25lZV9pZCI6eyJ2YWx1ZXMiOlsxMzldfX19 (https://instabase.testmo.net/runs/view/78?group_id=389&test_id=51881&filter=eyJtb2RlIjoxLCJjb25kaXRpb25zIjp7InJ1bl90ZXN0czphc3NpZ25lZV9pZCI6eyJ2YWx1ZXMiOlsxMzldfX19)
"*Owner can share an app*" - should it be a UI button, or just the fact that users other than creator can access via link?

generally the expected behavior should be documented within the item on Testmo

but that's not the case here, so thanks for asking! :sweat_smile:

it seems that @prateek.tenkale previously owned this item - do you remember what you checked for this?
I think for this one you log in as a community user, create an app, and try to share it
Then the other testmo item is for checking that the community user can open the shared link

What do you mean by "share"? 

As of now I don't see any "share" button, but it is possible to switch an app into a shared mode and manually copy a link
I believe it's the latter like you described but let me confirm
Yeah that’s it, to “share” an app you just use the link

Another question re UAT:
https://instabase.testmo.net/runs/view/78?group_id=353&test_id=51780&filter=eyJtb2RlIjo[…]p7InJ1bl90ZXN0czphc3NpZ25lZV9pZCI6eyJ2YWx1ZXMiOlsxMzldfX19 (https://instabase.testmo.net/runs/view/78?group_id=353&test_id=51780&filter=eyJtb2RlIjoxLCJjb25kaXRpb25zIjp7InJ1bl90ZXN0czphc3NpZ25lZV9pZCI6eyJ2YWx1ZXMiOlsxMzldfX19)

which kind of metrics we're talking about here?
e.g. I don't see any UI numbers re project creation
You will most likely need to log in as an org admin to access this page
